formula: Let a(i, n)=2^(i-1)*floor(1/2+n/2^i); sequence is a_n=sum_{i=1}a(i, n)(n-a(i, n)).Second differences give A006519.Also a_1=0 and a_n=floor(n^2/4) + a_floor(n/2) + a_ceil(n/2).G.f.: 1/(1-x)^2 * (x/(1-x) + Sum(k>=1, 2^(k-1)*x^2^k/(1-x^2^k))). - _Ralf Stephan_, Apr 17 2003a(0)=0, a(2n) = 2a(n)+2a(n-1)+n^2+n, a(2n+1) = 4a(n)+(n+1)^2. - _Ralf Stephan_, Sep 13 2003
prog: (PARI) a(n) = if (n==0, 0, if (n % 2, my(nn = (n-1)/2); 4*a(nn)+(nn+1)^2, my(nn = n/2); 2*a(nn)+2*a(nn-1)+nn^2+nn)) \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 27 2013
